name: strava_scrape_club
description: Scrape a Strava club page. Returns name, description, member count, and recent activities.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="ClubName"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const desc = document.querySelector('[class*="Description"], .club-description')?.textContent?.trim()?.substring(0,500)||''; const memberCount = document.body.innerText.match(/(\d[\d,]*)\s*members?/i)?.[1]||''; const sport = document.querySelector('[class*="sport"], .club-type')?.textContent?.trim()||''; return { club_id: '{{club_id}}', name, description: desc, members: memberCount, sport, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
